Class RoleCommandsService

A service responsible for managing role assignment and removal jobs within a guild.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AddToList(IGuild, IGuildUser, int, int, string, IRole, IRole?)

Adds a role job to the list with the specified parameters.

Declaration
public Task AddToList(IGuild guild, IGuildUser user, int jobId, int totalUsers, string jobType, IRole role, IRole? role2 = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the job is initiated.
IGuildUser user

The user who initiated the job.
int jobId

The unique identifier for the job.
int totalUsers

The total number of users affected by the job.
string jobType

The type of job (e.g., role addition or removal).
IRole role

The primary role involved in the job.
IRole role2

An optional secondary role involved in the job.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding the job to the list.

Returns
Type Description
IEnumerable<RoleCommandsService.RoleJobs>

An enumerable of RoleCommandsService.RoleJobs that matches the specified job identifier.
